response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This extraordinary piece holds immense value to us, representing years of innovation and dedication. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $850,000, believing that its unique features and benefits are well worth this investment. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll be joining a select group of individuals who appreciate the true essence of quality and craftsmanship. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further.", "product_price": 850000}
